page.title: 16ECOLOGY OF EAST MONKLANDS 4
page.content: THE 4 MAIN AIMS OF THE {CENTRAL {SCOTLAND WOODLANDS PROJECT}ARE BEING ACHIEVED AT A VARIRTY OF SITES IN EAST MONKLANDS: 1.TO IMPROVE THE LANDSCAPE AROUND TOWNS AND VILLAGES- THIS IS BEING ACHIEVED IN THE VILLAGE OF PLAINS BY THE {VILLAGE PLANTING SCHEME} AND THE{ {TREES IN GARDEN SCHEME.} 2.TO MAKE MORE PRODUCTIVE USE OF THE MARGINAL MOORLAND AREAS THROUGH {AFFORESTATION AND SHELTER.} 3.TO CLEAR AND SCREEN DERELICT LAND e.g.{SCREEN PLANTING}OF 16,800 TREES HAS TAKEN PLACE AROUND DALMACOULTER LANDFILL SITE. 4.TO PROVIDE ADDITIONAL AREAS FOR {RECREATION AND WILDLIFE CONSERVATION} IN NEWLY PLANTED WOODLANDS.
